price: তেন্তে তেওঁ পুনৰুত্থান দিৱসলৈকে মাছৰ পেটতেই থাকিলহেঁতেন।
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
